briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate a Therapeutic Vaccine, ASP0113, in Cytomegalovirus (CMV)-Seropositive Recipients Undergoing Allogeneic, Hematopoietic Cell Transplant (HCT)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 3 Trial to Evaluate the Protective Efficacy and Safety of a Therapeutic Vaccine, ASP0113, in Cytomegalovirus (CMV)-Seropositive Recipients Undergoing Allogeneic, Hematopoietic Cell Transplant (HCT)
summary: The purpose of the study was to evaluate the efficacy of ASP0113 compared with placebo as measured by a primary composite endpoint of overall mortality and CMV end organ disease (EOD) through 1 year post-transplant. Safety of ASP0113 in participants undergoing allogeneic HCT will also be evaluated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Composite of All-Cause Mortality and Adjudicated Cytomegalovirus End Organ Disease (CMV EOD) Through 1 Year Post Transplant
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first study dose injection (Day -14 to -3 prior to transplant) up to one year post study drug injection (Day 365)
